text:
I'm sorry, I just had to call out to you  
while you were practicing on your own.

I couldn't help but worry that  
you might be feeling anxious about the future.

Yeah. I understand that  
you want to continue being an idol with everyone.

So, it's not decided yet, but...  
I'll do my best to meet your expectations, no matter what.
So that Koito's efforts will be rewarded...
